name: nationalistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a nationalistic manner (= showing that you are too proud of your own country): References to the country's past are often nationalistically nostalgic. They were nationalistically inclined and hated anything they thought was "foreign".
More examplesFewer examplesThey do nothing but grumble nationalistically about immigrants.The concerts often included nationalistically inspired pieces of music.We should beware of this man's nationalistically aggressive rhetoric.She is speaking from a rather nationalistically biased point of view.Some of the research into the country's folklore was nationalistically inspired.
